caption.title: Results of the Susceptible-Exposed-Infected-Recovered-Dead model for normal infection. ( A) λ I = −0.1 days for Seoul is calculated as the difference between the actual epidemic peak d I.a = 53 days and the modeled epidemic peak d I.m = 53.1 days. ( B) λ I = 0.1 days for Gyeonggi is calculated as the difference between the actual epidemic peak d I.a = 50 days and the modeled epidemic peak d I.m = 49.9 days.
